title: Sofia Vergara reminisces about the '90s in youthful throwback bikini photo
text:
Sofia Vergara is throwing it back to a sexy summertime shot.

The "Modern Family" star, 47, took to Instagram late Thursday to share two side-by-side photos of her younger self.

"#tbt The 90’s Miami beach Fl," she captioned the images with palm trees and a laughing emoji.

In the photos, the Colombian native is showing off her toned, tan body in a baby blue string bikini with white trim.

And her followers couldn't get enough of the beach goddess, with the photo garnering over 625,000 likes.

People took to the comment section to share their reactions, too.

Celebrity hairstylist Jennifer Yepez wrote, "Divina como siempre," which translates to "divine as always."

More: Female celebrities over 40 who show off their body positivity

Influencer Jasmine Tosh shared a bunch of heart eye and fire emojis.

Vergara isn't shy about showing off her incredible figure, both then and now.

The actress graced the cover of Women's Health for their "Naked Issue" in September 2017 – and sent a message about body positivity in the process.

“Here’s a woman, 45, being able to show her body," she told the magazine. "It’s not like before when it was just young girls who would make the cover of a magazine.”
